message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $200. This is a one-time offer, so if you're interested, please let me know as soon as possible.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is significantly more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $80 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $200 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $140. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'm firm on my previous offer of $80.  It's the most I can afford, and I really hope we can make this work.
